titles.title: To extend the benefits of the weatherization assistance program under part A of title IV of the Energy Conservation and Production Act to Puerto Rico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 11/7/2001--Introduced. Amends the Energy Conservation and Production Act to make Puerto Rico eligible for the weatherization assistance program.
